metadata.name: THE DRAGON OF BITCOIN
metadata.description: As the darkness of the bear market flashes in and out of the dungeon the dragon will protect bitcoin until the day he dies.. he is enslaved forever being the gate keeper.. do not vision this dragon as a aggressive enemy... but see him as a friend.. a friend who is protecting our future generations wealth. This style you maybe wondering and asking for a more clearer vision of the piece.. EMBRACE THE BOKEH
